title: Start
body:
<<setBgMusic ThemeOfFriendship.mp3>>
Girl 2-renatasmilingface: Let's go again!
Girl 1: I'm hungry. Win by two?
Girl 2-renatasmilingface: You're on.
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<disableCollisions Renata>>
<<disableCollisions Mia>>
<<moveToX Renata Mia 35 60>>
<<moveToY Renata Mia 0 60>>
<<moveRight Mia 1 20>>
<<moveLeft Renata 1 20>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.1>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Renata>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Mia>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 14>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 14>>
<<set $balance to 0>>
Girl 1-miafiercefight:Here we go!
Girl 2-renatafightface: Prepare to lose, Mia!
[[telegraph]]

title: telegraph
body:
Noop
<<if $randomstate eq 0>>
<<set $move to 0>>
<<if $cluestate eq 0>>
Renata-renatafightface: Time to finish this!
<<elseif $cluestate eq 1>>
Renata-renatafightface: I can't miss!!
<<else>>
Renata-renatafightface: Falcon Rune!!
<<endif>>
<<elseif $randomstate eq 1>>
<<set $move to 1>>
<<if $cluestate eq 0>>
Renata-renatafightface: Falcon!!
<<elseif $cluestate eq 1>>
Renata-renatafightface: Let's go!
<<else>>
Renata-renatafightface: I could go for a mango.
<<endif>>
<<else>>
<<set $move to 2>>
<<if $cluestate eq 0>>
Renata-renatafightface: I could go for some barracuda.
<<elseif $cluestate eq 1>>
Renata-renatafightface: Falcon Time!!
<<else>>
Renata-renatafightface: I'm going to be the best fencer in Kanakan!
<<endif>>
<<endif>>
[[miachoice]]

title: whatsthescore
body:
Noop
<<if $balance eq 0>>
Mia: We're tied!
<<elseif $balance eq -1>>
Renata: 1 for me!
<<elseif $balance < -1>>
<<set $miawins to 0>>
[[save]]
<<elseif $balance eq 1>>
Mia: 1 for me!
<<elseif $balance > 1>>
<<set $miawins to 1>>
[[miawins]]
<<else>>
Noop
<<endif>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 14>>
[[telegraph]]

title: attackattack
body:
Noop
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 15>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 15>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<moveLeft Renata 4 60>>
<<moveRight Mia 4 60>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 16>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 16>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 17>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 17>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 18>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 18>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.7>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 17>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 17>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 16>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 16>>
<<moveRight Renata 4 60>>
<<moveLeft Mia 4 60>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 15>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 15>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 14>>
[[telegraph]]

[[whatsthescore]]

title: miawins
body:
Mia: I win!
<<moveUp Mia 10 120>>
<<moveDown Mia 10 90>>
Mia: Finally!
<<moveUp Mia 5 120>>
<<moveLeft Mia 4 120>>
<<moveUp Mia 5 120>>
<<moveLeft Mia 4 120>>
<<moveDown Mia 10 90>>
<<moveUp Mia 5 120>>
<<moveLeft Mia 4 120>>
<<moveDown Mia 5 90>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 19>>
[[save]]

title: save
body:
Noop
Mia-miafallingface: Ahhhhhh!
<<setMusicVolume 0>>
<<faceDown Maria>>
Renata-renatascaredface: I've got you Mia!
<<animationFrame Renata renata 10>>
<<moveToX Renata Mia 15 120>>
<<moveRight Mia 5 20>>
<<moveRight Renata 10 20>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 4>>
Mia: *huff*...Renata, you got me...
<<if $miawins eq 0>>
Renata-renatasmilingface: Of course I did! It wouldn't be as fun to win if you got a broken arm!
<<else>>
Renata-renatasmilingface: Of course I did! It'll take me months for my rematch if you break your arm!
<<endif>>
<<setMusicVolume 0.25>>
<<faceUp Maria>>
<<moveRight Mia 5 30>>
<<moveLeft Renata 5 30>>
<<pauseFor Renata 1>>
<<moveRight Renata 8 30>>
Mia: Ok, that's enough fencing for now.
Renata: Yeah, I'm hungry!
Mia: To the market!
<<attachTo Renata Mia>>
<<enableCollisions Mia>>
<<setHelpPrompt What are you doing? Let's go get food.>>
<<setBgMusic kanakan_market.mp3>>
<<set $needsfood to 1>>
[[end]]
